articles.title: Trump’s U-Turn on Nvidia Spurs Talk of Grand Bargain With China - Bloomberg
articles.description: Only a few years ago, the Biden administration declared export controls a “new strategic asset” to help the US maintain “as large a lead as possible” over China in advanced technology. President Donald Trump is now upending that approach.

articles.title: Google to Unveil New Pixel Hardware on Aug. 20 With AI in Focus - Bloomberg.com
